data.eml:eml: Assassin bugs (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae) of Uruguay: A synoptic catalogue as a contribution to the study of Austral biodiversity

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carmen, Maria Del (2011): Assassin bugs (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae) of Uruguay: A synoptic catalogue as a contribution to the study of Austral biodiversity. Zootaxa 3006: 50-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201377
